```{r}
install.packages(c("ggplot2", "ggpubr", "tidyverse", "broom", "AICcmodavg"))
```
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(ggpubr)
library(tidyverse)
library(broom)
library(AICcmodavg)
```
```{r}

```

```{r}
print(getwd())
data <- read.csv(file = './data/rqa_results-1.csv')
head(data)
```
```{r}
summary(data)
```
```{r}
one.way <- aov(recurrence_rate ~ high_performance, data = data)

summary(one.way)
```
```{r}
for (val in colnames(data))
{
print(val)
one.way <- aov(data[, c(val)] ~ high_performance, data = data)

print(summary(one.way))
}

```
```{r}
print(data[, c('recurrence_rate')])
```
```{r}
pairwise.t.test(data[, c('time')], data[, c('diversity')], p.adj = "none")
```
```{r}
for (val in list('entropy', 'longest_diagonal_line', 'time')){
  print(val)
  y = data[, c(val)]
  x = data[, c('diversity')]
  print(pairwise.t.test(y, x, p.adj = "none"))
  plot(x, y, col = "blue", main = paste(val, "plotted against diversity", sep=" "), xlab = "diversity", ylab = val)
  abline(lm(y ~ x))
}
```
```{r}
for (val in list('recurrence_rate', 'longest_diagonal_line', 'divergence', 'time')){
  print(val)
  y = data[, c(val)]
  x = data[, c('high_performance')]
  print(pairwise.t.test(y, x, p.adj = "none"))
  plot(x, y, col = "blue", main = paste(val, "plotted against performance", sep=" "), xlab = "diversity", ylab = val)
  abline(lm(y ~ x))
}
```

When you save the notebook, an HTML file containing the code and output will be saved alongside it (click the *Preview* button or press *Cmd+Shift+K* to preview the HTML file).
